That's great, I'll be getting the pro version immediately in that case :)

Nice app. Keeps me on task and is fairly easy to use. Edited review to 5 stars, as developer was prompt in solving the issue I had. I still am not convinced that editing line items is intuitive (apparently you tap to edit, and all other apps I've used like this just check the item when you do that), but no real issues at this point. I like the app and it has kept me productive and organized for the week I've been using it, so I'm happy with it.

Fantastic app! I travel frequently for business, and it always felt like every time that I would get to my hotel, I would find something that I had forgotten (forgot to pack clothes once, still not sure how I managed that). This app has been a lifesaver! It's so easy to add items, highlight priority items, check them off, and clear the list for my next trip. It's so visually pleasing too, I love being able to color code my lists. I would definitely give more than 5 stars if I could.

When I had an iPhone, I used the built in Reminder app relatively heavily to keep track of things I have to get done soon, remember something new to be done daily, or to break down a major side project into sub-tasks. Ever get a random idea and think "shoot, I gotta try that", just to forget it the next day. Put down a line item in this app. You may forget, but this app won't!!!

Great todo list\reminder app. Ease of use is it's strength. Great layout. I started to use it moreso, while using apps like any.do less-so. It offers many features for free that others charge for, and it's premium options are far more reasonable than other apps. It's refreshing to see an active developer who readily considers recommendations. (I will forward those as I use the app more and more). Great job, keep up the good work.

A while back I was looking for an app just like this, but all of their UIs were messy and they were just horrible to use. This app is perfect - lovely and clean and has all the functionality you'd ever want but all laid out in a way that doesn't cause visual clutter. Great for someone with ADHD!

Helps me stay organized and on task! I am an extremely busy person and this app has helped me so much with running multiple businesses at home and other side tasks and groceries that I need to get! You can set a due date and reminders and have tasks with sub tasks and notes. Very thorough! Thank you so much!

This app is a lifesaver! I love using it, and after trying a few different task apps. I decided on this one for the minimalism as well as the customizability. You can add quite a bit of depth to your task lists as well with the ability to add descriptions and sub tasks.

So far I'm loving this app. I had a very difficult time finding an app that I could set with a different ring tone than my notifications tone, meaning I missed a lot of reminders that I set. This app has changed all that for the better! Love how easy it is to snooze!!

Really great features, even though it took me a while to understand them. I really like the filtered lists and don't get the point of sublists yet. Pls make tasks repeatable without them having a reminder (you can set "reminder type : none" but not "reminder : don't remind me").

Simple, lots of great features, and mostly intuitive, though it is slightly odd using the big tick to save, and it took me a moment to find the option to mark an item as completed (i thought the big tick would do that). Really like the many options for notifications, subtasks etc.

I have only had this app one week, but I can't imagine ever living without it again. As another review mentioned, this app is a Godsend for anyone with ADD. The clean, simple layout makes it easy for my brain to process. Gone are the days of post its everywhere (only a few here and there 😁). Makes grocery shopping so easy! I have added it to my tweenaged son's phone, who also has ADD and suggested it to my supervisor, who lives by her to-do lists. You can also share lists! Great Job!

Okay, so I have ADHD which makes life damn near impossible sometimes, however the silver lining is this app! This app has saved me in so many ways. I can make infinite lists of whatever is on my mind at any time. I can keep up with exactly what i need to do and when. I can add all the reminders i want and I can customize to my hearts content. The developer is amazing and super helpful. I had a question about the upcoming web app and he replied fast and was very nice! the only thing that would make this app the absolute best of the best is an endless notes section going along with the lists and the web app otherwise this app is so perfect as it is!! I would give 100 stars if i could!!!!

Honestly, it's by far the most useful app you could possibly find that offers so many things without a ridiculous price tag. Having access to all the major for free is incredible and ,unlike other apps, doesn't ram "Upgrade to premium now" messages. I personally find it useful for keeping on track with hobbies such as writing books, as on can easily track the things I need to do. I would highly recommend this app because it's easy to use and is not intrusive like other apps.

I like this app, its a good layout and easy to use. It would be really good if it had a calendar feature where you could see past tasks that were completed or not. I have recurring tasks and it would be good to see what days I completed them etc. But this is a good app and I have enjoyed organising myself with it. (Following Steve's feedback below, it works how I want. Thank you Steve!)

App is Awesome But we Need Some Additional Features Like : 1. Quick Undo Button if We delete or Move any Task Mistakenly. 2. Thumbnail View of all Tasks. 3. Quick Commands Popup menu should be their for every Task in a Lists. i.e Copy , Delete , Share , move etc. I hope we'll get these Features soon in next Updates.

Awesome app! Helps me stay organized. The sub lists are extremely helpful, but I wish there could be sub lists within other sub lists. Other than that, man, this app rocks! EDIT: This app just keeps getting better!! With the addition of sub tasks, it's honestly the perfect task-keeping app. It's easy to see both complete and incomplete tasks, and they're all presented in an organized manner. You can also change the colour of the list which isn't just helpful, but fun too! 😁

Great News everyone!! Web Version is here!!! Just opened it up on my desk top, it's beautiful, and "everything is there, almost" except the "filtered list" haha...That's alright, we know you're still working on it, no problem. I have been waiting for this for a while now, and finally it's here! This makes the app all that more versatile, great app, and great developer! Thank you Mr. Nottage

Lots of good features but I feel it does not have a "default list" Or the landing page where you can find all the "tasks". Though we can create that using the filtered list but that shows the tasks without the list name. Sub tasks are showing with smaller font size and doesn't look good. Edit 1. Hi Steve, I generally don't give feedbacks. I gave it so that it may help you built a better app. Giving it a 5 star for your efforts.

This is easily the best to do list app out there. No bugs, no ads, no nonsense. Incredible intuitive UI (EASY TO USE) And offers lots of customization to personalize how you see, interact, and organize your priorities. Been using it for about two years and is a constant go to for my next task. Absolutely nailed it

Awesome app ever. To manage tasks I've tried many apps like Google's tasks, Microsoft's to do, any do, tick tick and many more but this app I found best one to meet all kinds of needs. App is wonderful on its own but should have some more important features like time limit, duration, expiry date and time for each task and sub task as well, each task and sub task should have its own reminders settings or follow main task reminders as well. Thanks

Been using it for a while. At first, i didnt like it as much, but then I played with the settings and was able to change what I didnt. I use it everyday to plan my day ahead. It's been way better than just having a running list in my notes. It saves your tasks so you can cross them out when you're finished but if its something you do regularly like laundry or something, you can just tap it to move it back to the top. Also allows subtasks. Def helps keep me organized. What I was looking for!

No more little pieces of papers with to do lists. Tasks is much more efficient. Love being able to check my lists and add or delete no matter where I am. I almost never forget my phone but that grocery list gets forgotten at home more often then not.

I like it because I can keep track of things I need to do. I like the highlighted color it's a good sky blue and it's easy to make lists. It feels good to complete a list that takes a long time to complete. It's good for making for later and good for getting things done I give it 5 stars thanks developer ☺️

Really good. Two things that would have major improvement. 1. Swiping tasks should be configurable. Not just delete. Say 3 options for right swipe, 3 for left. Also, I'm constantly finding myself wanting to move tasks as subtasks. Not possible. Should be. I will go premium the moment I see an update with these features. Promising. -*UPDATE*- I will join your community and go premium as well as donate. You have my support! Btw. The community, where is it? Not possible to join?

Very simple and easy to use. The file architecture and overview it gives me suits me perfectly. I run a farm and have many tasks on going (and interrupted) at the same time. Having to-do lists with so many sub folders lets me keep on top of all jobs at once. I would like to be able to move tasks between sublists if that is possible? Also perhaps a home page rather than side bar for top level of lists. Minor niggles, fine as is! A great app!

Easy to use but i wish i could reorganize the order of the sub tasks at times. Also it would be great if once a task is completed it moved to the bottom of the list so you dont have to keep scrolling down past it looking for other things on the list. Update: Thank you!!!! Knowing how to do these two things makes it perfect. I was telling everyone how nice it was before but knowing this makes it even better!

Really good app. Takes a little fiddling to work out how to get it set up just right. I like having it as a widget on my home screen so I can see tasks. Would be nice to be able to tick off tasks from the home screen widget without needing to open the app entirely but I am being pedantic. Edit: thank you! My phone obviously didn't accept it last time I checked. Changed to 5* :)

Simple and super useful! I have been using this app for a week and it's great for those pesky everyday personal chores that are overkill to manage through the calendar. It doesn't have unnecessary complicated features and just focuses on useful features that are really easy to use. Highly recommended. Thanks team !

It's really good. You can keep your tasks offline (no account needed), set reminders, create lists and sublists, and it's very thorough about the definition of tasks. Plus it's very good looking. An absolute must have

My concerns with syncing and backup will be adressed in a future update if you are a subscriber, which I am, and it's very cheap. Requests: A)From a list with two tasks (1) & (2) - long press one of the tasks (2) and make it a sub-task of the one above (1), without having to enter the task (1) and add a sub-task. The same thing in reverse, as well B)Being able to rearrange tasks and sub-task between each other in a list without having to enter a task C)Remove completed - Remove sub-tasks as well

I am always making lists, crossing things off and then rewriting a new list. I wanted to find a simple app to do simple lists, but then be able to form multi layer lists. This seems to do it all. A great interface.. I like it..

I really like how simple and visually appealing this app is. The lists are quick to put together and have a pop to them because of the varied colors, so they are easy to tell apart. I really like this app and it's helped me be more organized.

Simple and easy to use! The widget is fantastic and easy to read for a 50 year old trying to organize. No ads and free! I must say, i loaded at least 8 apps before i found this one and none of them compare. If you want an app that allows you to put tasks that you need to get done in an in your face format this is it!

Nice App. I need a way to organise my priorities and task when working on the computer. I like this app beccause the inerface is simple and practical. Creation of levels of task is easy and I love the fact that I can reorgnize my task in a list just by moving them up and down directly. I dont use this app for tasks in a synced calendar with complex reminders ...

This App is perfect for keeping track of tasks. I have one list I use for shopping and add to it as I think of things I need then don't forget anything while at the shops. I have another for payments I nerd to make on payday and so don't forget what to pay. One thing I'd like though is to be able to add the amount I payed each time but for what it claims to do it does very well.

This is one of the best to do apps. I use everyday and it helps me a lot. I found 3 minor issues though: 1. When you open the app after midnight, some of the weekly/monthly tasks that I've already marked as done appear again 2. When I switch on the phone, a lot of weekly/monthly tasks I marked as done appear again 3. When in the middle of entering a new task, if I click Back, I only get 2 options: discard or save. There should been a third option: Continue editing

Best task manager I've found for personal use. Simple, elegant, and fully functional. Quick add task feature makes it so I don't forget what I'm doing before I am able to write a detailed task out. The elegant and responsive interface helps me stay organized in a painless and efficient manner.

This app sets out everything I need to do in an easy to use manner, it also allows me to set reminders and highlight certain lists. I absolutely love this app, everything I need is sorted out and easy to find now. I've tried other apps and some were annoying to use, so I'm glad that I found this app.

This app is so helpful 😊 It helps me keep the different facets of my to-do list organized: house, yard, personal, work, health, and hobbies. You can create sub lists for each item as well. It alerts me when I should be doing something (I usually end up snoozing...shhhh), and I can make the tasks repeat. Thank you so much for this!

I've looked at about every app out there to organize tasks. This is by FAR the best out there. I've not found another with this much flexibility. I actually have not found anything I don't like about the app. Fits my every need. Great job!

I had been using a notepad app, but you had to backspace each item as you went along. With this app, I just click the item as it is done and it marks the item as complete. With one tap, I can remove all completed tasks at once! Plus, I have everything in one place! I highly recommend!

This app is wonderful! I've only had it for about a week, and it's changed my life! As someone with ADD, it's hard to stay on top of all my tasks and this allows me to add things quickly to different categories, sends helpful (and not annoying!) reminders, and overall is such a help. Thank you Tasks! Highly recommend.

This is awesome app to make notes and get it completed by just a tick. I've suggested this app to more of my friends and my manager to add the tasks. Usually I'll use it in home screen view which is more easy. Note for developer : if its possible can u please add the reminder for a routine task like daily meeting reminder. Now, the reminder settings is asking for due date which is fine for single task. The reson I'm asking is if this feature added this app will more benefitiel. Thanks

Love the app so far. It has great interface and plenty of options when it comes to organizing different lists. My only minor gripe with it is that the app becomes laggy when switching between large lists. Otherwise, great app.

Simple, straightforward, easy, well-organized. Exactly what I want in a to-do list app. One improvement would be syncing with a browser-accessible version, but if you are looking for a mobile-only app, this is a great choice.

Better than Google Tasks, Microsoft To Do, etc. Stephen has outperformed the biggest tech companies in the world with this side-project that has everything I need in a to-do app and feels just right. The widget is great. List creation, item sorting, sub-tasks, reminders, repeating due dates, task notes, priorities, and quick-add are all here and a breeze. Lots of ways to customize in Settings. Once the web version is done so I can sync/manage on my desktop, I'll go Premium. Thanks Stephen!

This app is intuitive and simple to use. I don't know about you, but I don't think making a list should be difficult! I've tried the others (all of them) and in every case, the first task I created was "learn how to use this app." It shouldn't take a PhD, people! Try this one out for yourself!

If you can, please add a feature to sync all the data with Google. 😉. So as soon as I add a task, it immediately gets synced with my Google account and then if I open tasks with my Google account on some other device, it immediately brings all my data. Otherwise, It is the best app to stay organised at all times!

Do I get a premium for free, if I report a bug😅. Edited :- I was just messing with you😅. I am an android developer myself and I know how hard it is to maintain something like this. Steps to reproduce the bug. Step 1 : Fresh install the app (No data in the app) Step 2 : Press and drag hamburger icon upward. Toolbar will go upside and you will not be able to drag it back again. But you can use the navigation drawer by dragging from left to right.

This is a super app. I was already using a similar app for years which also had the separately manageable widgets of todo lists ... but this is unsurpassed in terms of personal preference options. You can set the visuals to what's easy on your own eyes (colour, background transparency, font size) and there's also LOADS of functional options (how the lists manage tasks) to fit your own logic. Yet still helps you keep things looking simple, if you tend to get overwhelmed by todos, like me. BRAVO

I have looked at planner apps, to do apps and many more. This app is exactly how I lay out my calendar and tasks in a hand written journal. Easy to use and offers a great organized format with tasks and sub tasks. One suggestion: in my handwritten version I have a fold out spreadsheet for each task that lists items, supplies, costs, etc that I need to complete the task and I take that with me when I am shopping so I know what to pick up.

LOVE this app! As a person with ADD, I find this app indispensable in keeping my "out of sight, out of mind" tasks in mind. It's clean, easy to use and configure, and the alarm sound is lovely. One further question - does this app have an iOs version for my iPad??

Excellent app! I should've switched task apps a long time ago. This app has all the features of my old one (gtasks) and more in the free version. I love the colors for the lists. I love the repeating task option - this is critical for me. Thank you! I may donate to an app for the first time for this app!

Thanks Stephen for your immediate response on my query. The app was working fine, now I got the hang of it. I would like to revise my rating to 5 stars as this is by far the best tolist, task and reminder app, I have come across

The only thing is I thought it would love completed tasks to the end, but I can't seem to find that function anymore. It's fine, but sometimes I use to like to l back on the stuff I accomplished in a day or make sure what day something got done. No big deal.

I have stumbled on this app just now and downloaded it immediately and found that its reminder alarm is uniquely user friendly. In tha past I used Any do and Tick Tock, but none has an alarm that works like this app. It even has a snooze button. No doubt that my efficiency will go up by leaps and bounds. I have also just now subscribed for its cloud feature . But found the charges to be too high.. I request the developer to rithink and reduce the charges and also to introduce a one time payment.

Great app by a great developer. There are no advertisements at all, and it does what it promises. It's rare to find something of this quality on the appstore nowadays. One feature that would be nice is an option to set reminders to multiple days, but that's just my suggestion.
Lovely, very useful and simple to use. Multiple lists of tasks are available from the widget. Just one quibble, couldn't find a way to restore a list I accidentally deleted with a side swipe.

I've tried countess programs, but they all fell short and I reverted to time-consuming paper planning...until now. This program is easy, intuitive, and flexible beyond all the others I've tried, and it's beautifully designed. I love it!

This is an excellent app. The setup is clean and very user-friendly, it's fast, you're not bombarded with annoying ads, and to top it off, the app is free. I've had this app installed for a while now and it really has helped me keep different projects and tasks organized.

You don't have to erase your task to delete it. All you need to do is press the completed button and it finishes your work. it even tells how many tasks you have and how many you have done. It's great you should check it out. But best of all is to remember in your mind, it helps your brain.

Really simple, easy to use method that helps me stay on top of things, monitor my progress and not forget to do anything! I used to write hundreds of lists on pieces of paper and lose them, now I just have one list I use all the time.

It has been pretty good. My short term memory is declining, so having lists for all the tasks and things to buy has helped me a lot. The only thing I wish it had was a main screen to see the main tasks instead of using the side tab.

I've only been using this for about 5 minutes and I already enjoy it more than my previous list (Out of Milk) ! I love it. And thank you for the no ads :) Your icon is just fine. It caught my attention. AND I LOVE THE WIDGET AHHHH!

This app has been a God send. It is very well designed and a lot of thought went into its design and specifications. I have used other Todo programs and this is by far the best one I have used. Highly recommend, you will not be disappointed.

I rarely give reviews but this app is very well thought out from the colour to the prioritising feature. Thank you! I recently downloaded the app but I will give you my input incase I have a suggestion.

I don't think I've ever actually written a review for an app but felt compelled to say how brilliant Tasks is. Colourful, intuitive and organised. As someone who really benefits from structure but often finds productivity apps boring, this has been a game changer for me.

This task management app is phenomenal! It does everything that I would hope it can do and does it in a way that is so well organized and intuitive. One of the best apps of any type that I've come across.
Great app. Clean and easy to use. The ability use the alarm instead of just a plain notification that can be lost in all the other reminders is super helpful.

Wow! Wow! Wow! ........Great App...😊I love It.... I'm so much happy with this app.....Thank you team... 😀so nich features... I have deleted all other tasks app after installing it... Bcoz it covers all features.. Thank you once again.. 🙂keep improving the app.. ❤❤

Please add "time is over" reminder. For example after X hour(s) the app rings to say: hey the time of this tasks doing is over. I also want to report that alarm sound doesn't change and just notification sound can change. Thanks for the great app.

It's great to get reminders to complete tasks. Also, it's useful to be able to add items to my grocery list when I am out and about. Plus, once an item is added, I can mark it as picked up without deleting it from my list for next time.

I've been using this app for a few weeks and it is great. No trouble at all and very user friendly. Just what I need to track my daily checklists. The only thing I miss is being able to share my list with my wife. I hope that will be a feature in the future. Anyway, thank you so much for this app.

I live by my to-do lists, and this app has by far been the best I've found to create and organize them. I *really* wish, though, that there was a desktop version of this app as well, so I could manage my lists both on my phone and on my computer.
It's intuitive, concise, and well-organized. Works for daily tasks, shopping, etc. I appreciate that it allows a lot of customization, but also has ways to quickly add things for off-the-cuff listing

I love this app. It help me to stay organized all the time but I only have 1 problem I thought that when you set an date and time to do something it would alarm but it only sends a notification. Anyway I still love it.
The free version also is very cool and serves the purpose of its name. Adds are also not there and not annoying at all. I will keep this app in my mobile forever.
The best thing about the app is it crosses the tasks with a straight line, along with the time at which they get completed. This gives a unique satisfaction.

I use this practically every day for work. Better than Office Notes which used to occasionally delete my task lists for no apparent reason. This Tasks app doesn't crash or delete my stuff. I'm very appreciative
I have been looking for something that is aesthetically pleasing that I can use to keep track of my projects at work, and this is perfect! No more looking at a jumble of words on excel!

Super love this. I love that you can set tasks within tasks (hopefully one day tasks within tasks within tasks). You can prioritize them and track your tasks and all sorts of stuff. It is super helpful in helping me plan my wedding!!

Wowza, this app is definitely an upgrade!! Great customization and cloud backup. But, I need to see the due date in widget. Edit, dear Steve, if I wanted full screen widgets, I'd just open the app🙄 needs option to show dates on medium size.
I love this app! It is very helpful for organizing my day and has dramatically improved my life. I highly recommend this for making lists or just planning. ⭐⭐⭐⭐⭐

Look no further. Finally a good little app that functions easily and has different functions IF you want to use them. BONUS you can change the colots etc. I dont know why, but when i have a to do list its really important for mee to SEE IT, LIKE I NEED TO SEE IT,

The Best To Do List App! You can do basic line items or get really detailed with sub tasks, timers, and places to input information. I had downloaded several similar apps and this was the most user friendly. I absolutely love it!

Hi Stephen, Thank you so much for developing an app like this. I am only too happy to support developers like yourself, and due to the lengths you've gone to with making sure youve built something based around the consumers true needs I will be recommending others use it as well. Can you tell me if there's any option to invite users to work on a list together, or is it just the share option you have available? If it's the latter, would you have a think about implementing a feature as above?

I hate to rate an app....such a sjlep. So not doing it often...but this one deserves it. Well done. I'd enjoy being able to add custom themes (personal photo maybe with text color option)...cos I'm that kind of girl that photo's everything. :-)
Love this app! It's quick and easy to enter tasks, and when I assign a due date/time the reminders pop up to let me know is urgent or due now.

Great program! It keeps me organized. I label my categories after days of the week. Then I organize my days by puting my todos as subcategories. What ever one's I can't accomplish this program has a feature that allows my to move it.
Good at organizing tasks. The "Highlight" feature (and more importantly the ability to filter only highlighted entries) is great for managing to-do items.
Its awesome how you can categorise different to do list separately side by side. When you click done, it will show the date task is done. I like to use it to see how long a product can last.
Very helpful for my hardware lists
Can not share from the application to my email please assist
Very Smart and easy to use app. try it. It will take some time to learn everything but once you've done that You'll love it... 😄👍🏻
THE best to-do list app out there!
So so helpful! Exactly the amount of customization I need.
I have so many things in the writing in the lists :D
Thos list is nice.. Allows to add sublist and helps me track my task

The app keeps my annoying life very well organized even when I'm stressed because it can be used as any other kinds of lists such as a revenge list or a list which represents the ones that you've loved or hated as well....... I really owe a lot to this kind of app to get better when updating....... And I hope that we don't need to pay continuously, but buy once, free forever......😂😄
The exact type of organization app that I need. I have tried several other organizational apps and this is by far the best one!
This app is just what I needed to keep simple to do lists.
Great App!!
Great app stopping me from procrastinating... Actually getting things done 👍

This app is exactly what i want. Very satisfied with this app.A lot of colour options and can create lists and sub-lists. Easy and nice, user friendly. It will be better if i can copy task to a new task.
Easy to set up and navigate. Like it
can someone please tell me what to do to get alarm for everyday for daily routine and specific days automatically rather than creating the date everytime
Perfect for list making. Only thing I would do is let people have more customization options to make their lists more creative, but other than that it is a solid app I use daily.
Great, it has all the functionality that I need
Helps lessen my anxiety when I can not down my tasks and them see them marked off. Nice sense of accomplishment.
Accessible widget, can color code lists. Even displays the day each task was completed.
This app is simply amazing...helps u keep track of all Ur tasks...would definitely recommend to friends and family. 🙂👌👌
Easy to use & very helpful!
Best app for lists! And I'm picky... Great design, simple and straightforward, it has everything I need. Great job!
That's a great app
Nice App
Very organised
Its efficient and so simple to us!
Perfect for what I do
Absolutely what I needed to stay organised and keep on top of all the little things
Fantastic app, does everything it needs to. No more bits of paper all round the house with a half finished list of jobs.
Great app
I was going to do a ux design for something like this, but this is perfect. Lol. Oh well. And yay!
Great
Brilliant app. I searched a long time for the perfect todo/task list app and this is what came on the top. I highly recommend.
Simple, convenient & satisfies my requirements of maintaining tasks
Very useful
Great so far! Does everything I want it to do.
Great app
Great app easy to use

Brilliant app and absolutely no complaints at all. Helps me organise my tasks and I love the option of colour coding my lists. The interface is really one of the most user friendly. Only one big feedback is to extend the support of this app to Apple devices too. Would definitely recommend to all my iPhone using friends and family!

I've only been using this app for a short while but I love it so far. It's easy to create tasks, organize them into categories (lists) and sort them in a lots of different ways on a list. I love the feature of being able to specify subtasks to a task - I can keep track of the steps of an entire project under one line item. The only thing I don't really like so far is that it seems you cannot create a recurring tasks without giving it a due date.
This is so, soooo useful! I love too much to use just ordinary words. Keep doing the good stuff! Y'all rock ~
So simple and I find it very useful for organising my life tasks. Actually getting stuff done!
Very useful
It's a great experience. This app really helps me stay organized
Good list functionwhich is all I need
Simple and upto the task

I had too many projects, "to do" items and lists, I sometimes couldn't sleep. I'm not a big "techy" but this app is totally amazing and it has changed my life and more free time on my hands ! I'm still getting use to the change 😄 The only thing I would like to see on some of the lists, is a way to prioritize in order of execution...but still life-changing app..Thanks!👌👍👏🙏
I always preferred writing my task on a book. But a book and pen is not handy always an you tend to forget. This is perfect to Task it down before you forget
I find it very useful for making a quick list
Great app no regrets for downloading it 👌 I highly recommend this reminder app.
Does a good job, i like the widget
What a fantastic app, so simple to use yet so comprehensive in its functions. A great way to monitor and manage all of your day to day tasks, it's just a great app
Love this app! I've tried so many others for my task management and goal keeping, and this one is by far the best! Easy to use, simple, great layout and design, customizable, it's great. 11/10 guys!
Very useful

Let's ignore my previous point for a minute and consider this: a "Business Calendar" app that sends me adds about online games that I can "skip" by stopping the app and then re-opening... Really, if I'm a business person what would I want with an online game for children? 3. You mentioned the apps has to be deployed daily. Tough luck! I did not make your release schedule, you did. Furthermore I would be perfectly fine using an older version of the app, with no ads, or far fewer adds. I really don't care about the latest releases, and most business people don't either. We want stable things that we don't need to upgrade every week or so. 4. Since the ads covering the whole screen started being pushed I realized that your app has little added value over the calendar apps that came preinstalled on my mobile devices... And they don't have any adds.

Checked out this app in my quest to find a good solution for combining calendar events and tasks into a single, scrollable homescreen widget. --- Unfortunately, although the app has the option to repeat a task "from the completion date," the functionality is broken.  For example, I scheduled my test task on a Tuesday and set it to repeat every week from the completion date. The app forced there to be a day of the week listed in the repeat schedule, so that it would say something like "repeat weekly on Thursday on completion date." --- Now, having a day of the week and also "from completion date" makes no sense, so I was curious what the app would do. I set my Tuesday task to repeat every Thursday from completion date and checked it off on a Sunday. The app should have rescheduled the task for the following Sunday, but it didn't. It scheduled it for the following Tuesday and completely ignored the "Thursday" and the "from completion date." --- Sorry, Business Calendar 2, but that's just not going to work.

Main issues to solve: 1) in the icon app there isn't the indication of current day. It would be very useful to set fights event with different time zone. 3)the location link should be synchronised with Google maps results, not with the contacts, in order to have the right response for the addresses. Very nice app with a bad drawback: today's repetition for a recurring task will not appear unless I mark yesterday's task as done! Here's how this is very bad for me:  - I have many recurring daily tasks, and it's a very tedious job to mark all my recurring tasks as done, even those that were NOT done! It gets much worse if I don't use the app for a few days! Then I have to mark all recurring tasks as done for every and each previous day!!!!  - The app forces me to record false information! A task that was not done on a specific day, should stay there as NOT done, and the recurring task should be generated for the following day.  - You have only 3 options for a recurring task: 1) to mark it as done in order for it to appear on the following day. 2) not to mark it as done, and it will never "recur"! 3) to delete, and it disappears, and naturally, it will never "recur"!  A recurring task should recur, regardless of marking or not marking the previous repetition as done!
